item.description:
Over the past year we have explored questions about faith, religion, purpose to life, what happens to us after we die, love, relationships, sex, and the missing piece. Father Walter Cuenin, a Catholic Priest, will teach us the core beliefs of Catholicism and gives his religions perspective on the questions we have explored.

Father Walter Cuenin is a Roman Catholic Priest and Chaplain at Brandeis University. An active priest, in good standing, he is also open minded, liberal and enjoys a good discussion about the issues that the Catholic Church and people of all faiths face.

Father Walter Cuenin has kindly invited us to his home, where in addition to providing us beer and wine, he will offer his and the churches insights on some of the deepest and thought provoking questions we face.
item.name: Exploring Life's Deepest Questions with a Catholic Priest
